values:
2 and a half days of school left!
thank GODDD! im sick of this place.
except, i guess im gonna miss seing my friends all the time.
& all the teachers...cause they were all nice. :)
i guess i dont have the best ending to this school year.
but things will get better over the summer.
im excited...cause tylers partayyyy is on friday!
& i think im having some friendsss over on thursday...after SCHOOL.
wow..thats the last time im gonna have to say "after school" for a while.
ohhh i love it. 
but i gotta meet a boy this summer...cause right about now..theres no one that i do like..& no one TO like. the single boys at our school are lame. 8)
i guess theres some stuff i regret doing this year...but not that many.
you just have to live life the way you want to.
and if someone doesnt like it then they can complain to someone else.
because im sure no one really wants to hear it anyways.
& i've decided im gonna try and not talk about people so much..& that if im mad at them, or if they do something to bug me, i'll tell them..instead of someone else who will tell them anyways. because i hate hearing when someone says somethgn about me from another person, & i think most people would rathewr hear it themselves. 





but yeah. im not going anywhere really this summer...the only place i AM going is my cottage...for a week. so it's not that big of a deal.



anyways...call me sometime this summer to hangout! causeee yeahh?

OKay, so this school year has DEFINATELY been a good, bad, sad, crazy, dramatic, FUN year! & i dont think i would have gotten by without my friends, seriously.

Olivia- WOW. you have been there for me through pretty much EVERYTHING this year. I know, that in some past times we didnt like eachother very much..but bitch that was like 2 years ago! ;) but really, you are like on of the best friends i have ever had. i cant even like...say all of the "goodtimes" i've had with you..but i would have to say the best one would obviously be SINK!!! haha woah baby! =O that was so um...funny? lol but yeah anyways...im guessing were gonna hangout this summer..well i kinda know..muahahahaa. BESTFRIENDS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

annnna ruGGero! <--(spelled it right!) woahhhh. we got tiiight this year! lol but im glad we did...cause then i would prolly just be bored all the time...cause i just use you. jk. =D you have been there for me so much this year! & i dont know how to thank you. i know you've had some rough times with the boys...but so have i. and you know that if you ever need a friend to talk to...im here. =] im really glad were friends. and i hope we are for a longggg time! or else my life would be no fun! =O ;)

taylor- uhh. i hate you. thats all there is to say. DUHH! ;) haha just kidding! so we are obviously not as close as we were last year. but were still good. =] i love when were in bad moods...so i have you spend the night, we plan to watch sad love story movies, and we end up watching ladder 49& kids in america..but thats just how sweet we are! i still feel like your oen of those friends i can tell basically anything to, and pretty much trust you...& thats a good thing. im really glad were still friends and that i have language arts and math with.......TELLY! muahaha jk! but those classes are fun with you!

maxineeeeee!- going downtown with you while stalking people is really fun! its also fun to have raves with you in the middle fo gym class, while waving at random people driving by, i bet that when we play captre the flag, people wish they were as good as us at flag keeping! you are a great friend to have, and we have very...interesting times when we are together. im glad we got closer this year, & that we CHILLLLL more! ;) haha best friends for NEVER!!! ;)

danielle-im glad were starting to talk/hangout more again..cause those days back in fifht grade were pretty freaking sweet! weve had plenttyyyyy of goodtimes & i prollyc ouldnt remember like 1 8th of them if i tried! lol camping last summer was FUN times 847358975209! haha especially riding up that one like parking lot hil thing (i keep remembering that! lol) but this summer we gotta hangout more...cause i miss you!! =[ well i have known you & olvia for like ever...& you are ne of the best friends i have ever had in my life. & im gled you dont have to move...like you guys thought you were gonna have to! cause that wouldnt have been good at all! but anyways...thankyou for being a great friend! D-FENCE & C-FENCE!!!!!

nikki- i know we kinda had some troubles this year..but thats all done now! & its in the past! lol im glad we got like...okay & stuff again cause your a really funny/great friend to have! we got to play the toe game a little on the bus this year...but not as much as last year..but thats okay..cause sadly it was a BIT easier this year.lol im glad that were friends...i guess? haha just kidddding! by the way...i dont feel like even trying to say all the goodtimes we've had, cause that would take a bit to long. ;)

ASHLEYGOVAN!- woahhhh baby. I LOVE HEALTH! haha i ust cant say it enough times. its SOOOOOOOO FUN. pissing off mr karolak. & trying to be serious when they talk about how to have sex in hte movie. even though it doesnt work. so i dont think i got pink eye =/ but thats only cause your on freaking medication! grrrrr. ;) i really wanted it too! i woulda got to miss school! haha im happy we got to be like way better friends this yearcause your really funny & nice. im gonna miss being in health with you chirs dave & scott. well idk about dave...but....lol jk. btu i will miss it. but i wont have to miss you...cause were gonna hangout this summer! =D













LETS MAKE THIS SUMMER THE MOTHER FUCKING BEST ONE YET!

okay. so today we got out of school at 11:00. SPRING BREAKKK! but yeah..so me and taylor and maxine stopped at my house to change..cause we didnt really wanna wear skirts anymore...so then we walked up to taco bell and like..not a lot of people were there anymore...so we left there and went across the street to jims, then ben mitch and david wolfe were there...so we hung out with them for a while. and then we were sitting outside of tubbys and olvia brandon and joey got there! AND I STEPPED ON THESE THINGS AND THEY ENGRAVED INTO MY FOOT AND I DIED. it hurt. but then me livy maxine taylor brandon joey and kadhim all came back here and hung out till like 4...then joey brandon and kadhim had to leave cause my mom was going somewhere..and then maxine left at like five. and then me livy and taylor just kinda talked untill like 6:30 or 7:00 and then they left. and then i re did my make up for no reason cause i ended up doing nothing. but thats cause im tired. so yeah. that was my day! :) lol it was really WAYYYYYYYY more interesting then it seemed. cause we had goodtimes in my basement. ;) and kadhim REALLY likes my tree. :/ but i guess thats okay.

ANYWAYS. if you wanna hangout over break then just IM me or call the cell or comment this if you wanna i guess!







:) loveyou. bye

okay, so like..i dont even know how long it's been since i've written in a live journal. haha oh well. 

schools been pretty good, i guess. except for the part about grades. 

=x shh. whatever though.

so taoday we like..had all our cores in the morning, then went to exploritoriees and at like 12:50 we went the the winter olypics. haha it was really fun. =) && im really happy i didnt have to do anything.
i wanna do something next year though.
caus eit would be fun. =D 

but anyways. after that we had a volleyball game. a team won 2 lost 1.
we won 1 lost 2. oh well though. it was at addams. so that was fun.
umm. then i came home & decided not to do anything tonight.
cause i like havent gotten like any sleep since like..forever ago. 
but yeah i still gotta pack cause im going to my grandmas for the weekend.
i'll be back on monday prolly at like 4-4:30ish.
but its five hours away. =[ boo on that.



soo yeah comment if you wanna hangout next week!!!!!!!!









i REALLY miss summer.
&& all the good times we had. =/
but most of all;; i miss you.

CANT TOUCH THIS. =O muahaha.

so im at OLIVIAS! with olivia(duh) and taylorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. =]

 

woah..i swear i LOVE olivias house<3 fun stuff dudes and dudettes.

anyways...we watched ladder 49..i criend my eyes out!! lol..then we had a walk to remember inbut didnt exactly watch it..oh well.

and i was playing some simpsons game thing..and wow...i really suck at it. muahahaha.

 

yup...so tomorrow were definately going to bruegers?...yes..yess we are.

later loves. xo

 

comment!!

                                       callie <3

 

woah baby its like.. almost 4:30 am and im not really tired..oh well...lol livy and taylor  are both asleep.

okay..so far my summer break has been pretty good! =]

except for the part where i got in a fight with taylor. =[ but were good now.

fake people piss me off.or when people use other people JUST TO SWIM IN THEIR POOLS. hmm think about who you are.

okay. if your not invited somewhere there must be a reason, like maybe the people dont want you there, or maybe the person's parents said no, or maybe they just wanna hangout with someone else. so basically if yor not invited somewhere then DONT TRY AND INVITE YOURSELF OVER THERE. because theres always a reason. sorry but i had to say that..because some people dont understand it. anyways...this one person..who used to be like my best friend has definately changed this year. but i guess everybody changes..thats just life, and you have to deal with it. but anyways..shes kindof OBSESSED with guys. and everyone knows it. they just dont admit it to her. but w/e.

so right now im listening to ashlee simpson. woohoo. not. and im doing the laundry..i look like crao cuz my hairs in a ponytail and i have my toronto shirt and pajama pants on. i look pretty bad. haha but i dont really care...i mean i'll obviously change if i go somewhere but oh well...this is a wierd entry cuz i never really wrrite about how im dressed??..haha anyways. i feel really wierd....muahahhaha

 

 

 

soo yeah, if you wanna hang out today or tomorrow or something IM me on soinlovex3548 or call me..248 399 3174. yup

 

 

 

 

i want rain with no thunder and lightning =]

 

 

 

 

 

 


yeah. so tell me. what do you think of me?

 

 


xo my loves.

 

 

 

<3 callie

who knows..maybe i'll go back to the other one..lol
